# Interface Implementation Docs

> Documentation for Interface Implementation Docs.

- [Safely update interfaces using default interface methods](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/advanced-topics/interface-implementation/default-interface-methods-versions.md): This advanced tutorial explores how you can safely add new capabilities to existing interface definitions without breaking all classes and structs that implement that interface.
- [Create mixin types using default interface methods](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/advanced-topics/interface-implementation/mixins-with-default-interface-methods.md): Using default interface members you can extend interfaces with optional default implementations for implementors.
- [Explore static virtual members in C# interfaces](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/advanced-topics/interface-implementation/static-virtual-interface-members.md): This advanced tutorial demonstrates scenarios for operators and other static members in interfaces.
